relevant_communication: As company specialized with 50 years experience providing integral solutions for any deployed operator (armed forces, red cross, civil protection, health ministries, planification, etc...) attendance to seminars, meetings, conferences... in relation with the support to EU policies related with Humanitarian Aid & Crisis Management, Emergencies, Catastrophes, etc.
goals__remit: Design, manufacture, supply and maintenance for both civil and defence sectors of: Containers, Trailers and Portable Equipment of: Food Services, Hygiene, Infrastructures, Barracks and Field Camp, Medical use, Transport, Storage and Maintenance, Field Kitchens, Mimetic Nets, Gun Racks, Hangars and Field Tents, Field Hospital, Mobile Units of Command and Control and Logistics, HVAC, Supply of Camp and Barracks, Medical Equipment and Spare Parts related with all the above mentioned products.
